hero.title: Connect. Automate. Scale. Repeat.
hero.lead: ServiceTsunami is the unified command center for enterprise operations. Consolidate ERP, finance, HR, compliance, and AI across every business unit from day one.
hero.subtext: Stop stitching together spreadsheets and legacy systems. One platform to run your entire operation — from growth pipeline to optimization.
hero.subHighlight: The operations platform that scales with every business unit.

governedDataProducts.title: Unified Back Office Across Business Units
governedDataProducts.description: Consolidate ERP, finance, banking, and spend management across every business unit. One chart of accounts, one source of truth, one dashboard for the entire organization.

unifiedLakehouseFabric.title: AI Agents That Know Your Business
unifiedLakehouseFabric.description: Deploy autonomous AI agents for hyper-local ad campaigns, insurance RCM automation, HR compliance, and financial reporting. Agents learn each business unit's context and operate 24/7.

agenticAutomation.title: Growth Pipeline to Optimization Playbook
agenticAutomation.description: Track opportunities, run assessments, model integration plans, and manage operational readiness — all in one place. Purpose-built for operators running 5 to 500 business units.

items.label: ERP & Finance
items.value: One Back Office, Many Business Units
items.description: Consolidate general ledger, AP/AR, payroll, and banking across every business unit. Eliminate duplicate systems, reduce headcount overhead, and close books in days instead of weeks.

items.label: AI-Powered Ads
items.description: Deploy AI-driven ad campaigns tailored to each business unit's local market. Automatically optimize creative, targeting, and budget allocation across hundreds of locations.

items.label: Compliance & HR
items.description: Onboard new business units to unified HR policies, benefits, and compliance frameworks instantly. Automate state-by-state regulatory tracking and reduce integration timelines by 80%.

features.heading: Every Module Your Operations Need
features.subtitle: From opportunity sourcing to optimization — one platform, zero integration headaches.

connectEverySource.title: Growth Pipeline & Assessments
connectEverySource.description: Track growth targets, manage opportunities, run automated assessment checklists, and model integration plans. Never lose a deal to disorganization again.

semanticControlPlane.title: Banking & Spend Management
semanticControlPlane.description: Centralized treasury, unit-level banking, automated expense policies, and real-time spend visibility. Control cash flow across your entire organization from one dashboard.

agentAutomationStudio.title: Insurance & RCM Automation
agentAutomationStudio.description: Automate revenue cycle management, claims processing, and insurance workflows with AI agents. Reduce denial rates, accelerate collections, and eliminate manual follow-ups.

lakehouse.heading: Built for Operators Who Move Fast
lakehouse.description: Operations fail when integration stalls. ServiceTsunami ensures every business unit is operational from day one.

unifiedGovernance.title: The Integration Problem
unifiedGovernance.description: Most organizations spend 12-18 months integrating each new business unit onto legacy systems. ServiceTsunami cuts that to weeks with pre-built playbooks and AI-powered automation.

programmablePipelines.title: The Visibility Problem
programmablePipelines.description: Operating 50+ business units on different systems means no one has the full picture. Our unified platform gives you real-time P&L, cash flow, and KPIs across every unit.

compliantCollaboration.title: The Scale Problem
compliantCollaboration.description: Adding headcount for every new business unit kills your margins. AI agents handle routine finance, HR, and compliance tasks so you can scale operations without scaling overhead.

adaptiveGuardrails.title: Faster Integration
adaptiveGuardrails.description: Reduce post-onboarding integration from months to weeks. Pre-built playbooks for ERP migration, HR onboarding, and financial consolidation.

explainableDecisions.title: Lower Overhead
explainableDecisions.description: AI agents replace manual processes across finance, HR, and compliance. Scale from 10 to 100 business units without proportional headcount growth.

lakehouseSignals.title: Operational Readiness
lakehouseSignals.description: Clean financials, unified systems, and auditable data from day one. Your operations are always in order.

dataIntegrationLayer.title: Data & Integration Layer
dataIntegrationLayer.description: Connect ERPs, banks, payroll systems, and CRMs. Ingest data from every business unit into a unified data lake with automated reconciliation.

semanticGovernanceLayer.title: Orchestration Layer
semanticGovernanceLayer.description: Temporal-powered workflows handle cross-unit processes: financial consolidation, compliance checks, integration playbooks, and scheduled reporting.

agenticExecutionLayer.title: AI Agent Layer
agenticExecutionLayer.description: Autonomous agents for ad optimization, RCM automation, financial analysis, HR compliance, and more. Each agent understands unit-level context and operates continuously.

ai.heading: AI Agents for Every Function
ai.description: Deploy specialized agents across your organization.

insightCopilots.title: Financial Intelligence Agents
insightCopilots.description: Consolidate P&L across business units, flag anomalies, forecast cash flow, and generate board-ready reports. Like having a CFO team that never sleeps.

composableSkills.title: Operations & Compliance Agents
composableSkills.description: Monitor regulatory changes, automate compliance filings, manage HR onboarding, and track insurance claims. Reduce risk while scaling faster.

closedLoopActuators.title: Growth & Revenue Agents
closedLoopActuators.description: Run hyper-local ad campaigns, optimize pricing, manage customer acquisition, and automate revenue cycle management across every business unit.

marketplaceConnectors.title: Private Credit & Lending
marketplaceConnectors.description: Integrated debt management, covenant tracking, and lender reporting. Manage capital structure across your entire organization.

adaptiveGovernanceAi.title: Optimization & Analytics Hub
adaptiveGovernanceAi.description: Automated reporting, data room generation, quality of earnings support, and stakeholder management. Be operationally excellent at all times.

autonomousFinopsSuites.title: Industry-Specific Playbooks
autonomousFinopsSuites.description: Pre-built integration templates for healthcare, home services, professional services, and other high-frequency operational verticals.

testimonials.heading: Built for Enterprise Operators
testimonials.subtitle: How multi-unit operators are scaling with ServiceTsunami
